settings.description: Novel design specifically for full size crew cab trucks that have fold-up rear seats.
Covers the back of the front seats, the floor, and the folded up seat bottoms.
Heavy Duty, Easy to Clean Material

settings.quote:
Perfectly sized to fit. Love the material;
seems extremely tough
settings.author: Hugh C.

settings.heading: Design and Function Meet Convenience
settings.description: Novel design specifically for full size crew cab trucks that have fold-up rear seats. Covers the back of the front seats, the floor, and the folded up seat bottoms.

settings.heading: High-Quality Products Built to Last
settings.description: Our seat covers are designed with padded & quilted fabric that’s easy to take care of and can withstand wear and tear. The colorfast fabrics won’t fade. We also offer a lifetime warranty on every product.

settings.heading: Keeping Pets Safe, Happy and Healthy
settings.description: Our pet seat covers feature a non-slip backing and fasten in place with sturdy seat anchors, keeping your dog safe while in motion. Our products are also free of AZO dyes and heavy metals.

settings.heading: Dog Floor Hammock for Crew Cab Trucks with Fold Up Seats
settings.description: This 4Knines Floor Hammock was designed from customer requests for this solution. This cover goes down the back of the front seats, along the bottom of the floor and back up the rear seats with the seats folded up. Keep your car clean and your pet safe while driving.

settings.heading: Sized to Fit Your SUV
settings.cta_label: Watch the Cargo Liner Fit Guide
settings.description:
Small: 42" x 78" (including 20" bumper flap)

Large: 52" x 82" (including 20" bumper flap)

XL: 55" x 106" (including 20" bumper flap)

Please measure to ensure a great fit.

settings.heading: Waterproof & Non-Slip
settings.description: Special solid waterproof layer makes the seat bottom completely waterproofed (seams, stitching, and zippers are not watertight).

settings.heading: Installs in seconds with quick-release clips
settings.description:
Easy to Clean

Hose it down, wipe down with a moist towel, or toss it in the washer to keep it looking fresh and clean.

Lifetime Warranty

No-hassle 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee & Lifetime Warranty (defects in materials or workmanship).
